amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the EPA Office of Compliance and Enforcement by $5.4 million to increase personnel levels by 54 positions.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funds (by transfer) to restore personnel levels at EPA to previously funded levels.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Inslee amendment (A016) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A016) offered by Mr. Inslee.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Inslee amendment (A016) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
